title: I hate you Saintvicuios
body: You always kill yourself at the end, you don't care about me losing that 1/2 point lost in fantasy

replies.body: They warned you about this in primetime leage this week, your fault for keeping him

Do you not get the sarcasm...

come on, not everything is so serious

Sarcasm via Text is a difficult concept because there is no Tone of Voice to impress upon said sarcasm.

If you wanted to, add a /sarcasm or Kappa
He also has said it in multiple interviews. "I don't care about Fantasy"
